translations: v．任命，安置：将某人放置或安置在某个职位或地位上。
· He was instated as the new CEO of the company.
他被任命为公司的新首席执行官。

sentences.sentence: Suspended certifications can only be re-instated by the USDA, not by the certification body.
sentences.translation: 暂停认证只能由usda恢复，而不是认证机构。

sentences.sentence: However, those certificates (in Sarawak and Guyana) have been withdrawn and not re-instated.
sentences.translation: 然而，那些证书(在沙捞越和圭亚那)已被撤回，且不能重新恢复。

sentences.sentence: Mothma instated a policy in that every two years members of the Alliance would vote on her continued command.
sentences.translation: 莫思玛实行了一条政策，即同盟成员每两年将对她是否留任举行投票。
